section.title: opportunities creating new stages for Opportunity Stage
section.para: To create a new Opportunity Stage, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new Opportunity Stage, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a name to define the Opportunity Stage.
Enter a brief description of the Opportunity Stage.

varlistentry.term: Mark Opportunity Inactive at this Stage

listitem.para: Select if you want the system to automatically mark Opportunities as inactive when they reach the specified Stage.
